name: Healing & Intuitive Guidance
description:
Private intuitive counselling session and Reiki energy healing. These services promote and enhance an individual's health and well being. If you suffer from stress, anxiety or any personal or emotional issues, I am able to use my gift to assist you to heal your mind, body and soul.

*** TESTIMONIALS ***
I have been extremely pleased with the professionalism, technical knowledge, excellent customer service skills along with the genuine caring that Cindy brings to each and every one of my appointments.  Every appointment I have had with her is like taking a vacation in an exotic location where I receive relaxation away from my hectic life style, only to emerge like a butterfly from a cocoon looking refresh, DIVAlicious, and ready to conquer life. I look forward to each and every appointment with her because she is so amazingly talented, and GOD centered.  The other thing I like about Cindy is that she respects your time, and focuses only on you during your appointment with her.  I am glad GOD allowed me to meet her for such a time as this.  What a true blessing!     Thank you GOD.
 
Olga (Chris) Martin

*******************************************

The services that have been provided by Cindy for me is worth far more than words could ever express.
 From the very first time I had a conversation with her until now she never cease to amaze me. A wife, mother, an entreprenuer and yet with all that going on when you receive services from her, she directs her complete attention toward you like you and her are the only two on the face of the planet. The services she provides centers around the love she has for your health, healing and beauty, it far surpasses any experience I've ever received from any one in the same field. Cindy is truly a blessing from God because only He could send someone like her in this world to help people the way that she does. I highly recommend and strongly encourage anyone who would need her services to give her a try, you will not be disappointed.

Roberta Martin.

name: Diva By Cindy Hair Polish - 8oz
description:
This Hair Polish contains natural ingredients that smooth the hair shaft. Shines and silkens hair instantly. Works great on wet and dry hair. On damp hair, spray on and comb or brush through for extraordinary shine. Blow dry or let hair dry naturally. On dry hair, spray on and comb or brush through for exceptional shine. Hair will appear naturally glossy, not greasy.

Want pretty, polished locks? Who doesn't! When used on both wet and dry hair, Diva by Cindy's Hair Polish will add super silky texture and mega shine to your strands. 

Shecky's Best Shine Enhancer Award Winner 2012.

categories.name: Frizzy, Needing Curl Definition & Soft Hold
Transitioning from Relaxers to Natural Hair

name: Doggie Diva By Cindy Knot Be Gone Detangler - 8oz
description:
This Detangling Conditioner stops excessive shedding and detangles fur leaving it with a fresh smell while enhancing it's shine. Your Dog will no longer run when he/she sees the hair brush. You will also spend less time bathing  and shampooing as the  Leave-In Detangler can be used daily.
Doggie  Diva is a natural alcohol free product line formulated with B Vitamins which detangles and beautifies dogâ€™s fur.

name: Doggie Diva By Cindy Doggie Wash - 8oz
description: This Doggie Wash Shampoo is infused with botanical ingredients such as Aloe Vera to soften and moisturize fur,  Lavender Aromatherapy oil for fresh smelling fur and promotes relaxation at bath time. It also contains Green Tea, Vitamin E and Vitamin A for healthy skin and vibrant fur and silk protein to soften and detangle fur.  Shampoo will thoroughly cleanse fur leaving it shiny , healthy , soft and manageable.  Your dog will enjoy a fresh smelling coat.

name: Diva By Cindy Moisture Shampoo
description: Restores balance, cleanses, and repairs damaged and chemically processed hair. Moisture Shampoo is designed to give superior detangling and add moisture as it conditions all hair types. Excellent for chemically processed hair.

categories.name: Frizzy, Needing Curl Definition & Soft Hold
Transitioning from Relaxers to Natural Hair

name: Diva By Cindy Ultimate Hair Treatment - 16oz
description:
Penetrates into the cuticle & rebuilds 90% of the hair bonds. 
Use as treatment for hair that is damaged, breaking or shedding. 
Stops Shedding and breakage instantly. 

Shampoo hair using Diva By Cindy Moisture Shampoo. Rinse thorougly and saturate hair from root to ends with The Ultimate Hair Treatment.  Apply processing cap for 20 minutes or sit under warm dryer. 

For best results, apply Diva By Cindy Leave-In Detangler and blow dry,  wrap or roller-set. For extremely damaged or color treated hair,  may be used more often.

categories.name: Frizzy, Needing Curl Definition & Soft Hold
Transitioning from Relaxers to Natural Hair

name: Diva By Cindy Relaxer System
description:
Relaxer ** (step 1)

Designed to straighten hair; Contains Aloe designed to protect   the hair during the relaxing process, while making it straight, silky, & soft.

Stabilizer Plus ** (step 2)

Penetrates into the cuticle & rebuilds 90% of the hair bonds; apply a low pH shampoo over it & massage into hair; may also be used as a treatment for hair that is damaged, breaking, or shedding. 

Neutralizing Shampoo ** (step 3)

Quickly returns hair pH to normal, while the mink oil and protein lock in the moisture. It cleanses and lifts dirt and oil from the hair.

name: Diva By Cindy Shea Body Lotion - 8oz
description: Enriched with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E and Aloe, this special formula helps protect your delicate skin, and keeps it soft, smooth and silky. Non-greasy and fast absorbing. Try it, your skin will love it!

name: Diva By Cindy Purr-fect Edges - 4oz
description:
This is a unique styling tool for creating those special effects. Use it to silken, define and shine, enhance color, create wispy or spiked effects....whatever your artistic freedom imagines.

Contains no alcohol, never greasy or oily, no waxy buildup to attract dirt or pollution. Assures proper moisture balance to cleanse scalp and prevent dryness. Imparts softness, manageability and sheen to relaxed hair.

name: Diva By Cindy Stimulating Conditioner
description: This is a unique moisture rich conditioner with panthenol & silicone especially designed to rebuild the moisture base; draws moisture to damaged areas to help prevent breakage, imparts a non-oily silky feel with a glossy sheen, detangles & improves hair combability, and creates an invigorating & tingling sensation to the scalp.

categories.name: Thinning Hair, Stunted Hair Growth, Dry, Itchy, Flaky Scalp

name: Diva By Cindy Moisture Conditioner
description: This is a unique moisture-rich conditioner with panthenol and silicones especially designed to rebuild the moisture base, draw moisture to damaged areas to help prevent breakage, restore hair normal acid mantle pH, impart a non-oily silky feel with a glossy sheen and detangle and improve hair combability.

categories.name: Frizzy, Needing Curl Definition & Soft Hold

name: Diva By Cindy Moisture Set
description:
Set includes: Moisture Shampoo (8 fl. oz.), Moisturizing Conditioner (8 fl. oz.), Leave-In Conditioner (8 fl. oz.), Purr-fect Edges (4 fl. oz.)

Moisture Shampoo is designed to give superior detangling and add moisture as it conditions all hair types.

Moisturizing Conditioner designed to rebuild the moisture base, draw moisture to damaged areas to help prevent breakage, restore hair normal acid mantle pH, impart a non-oily silky feel with a glossy sheen and detangle and improve hair combability.

name: Diva By Cindy Stimulating Shampoo
description: A truly unique, therapeutic formula designed to gently & deeply cleanse hair and scalp; contains special soothing agents combined to relieve itchy, flaky, & dry scalp commonly associated with dandruff; provides a pleasant tingling sensation as you enjoy healthy hair & a rejuvenated scalp.

categories.name: Thinning Hair, Stunted Hair Growth, Dry, Itchy, Flaky Scalp

name: Diva By Cindy Silky Smooth Wrapping Lotion - 8oz
description: This is an innovative formulation for Wraps, Finger Waves, Pump Waves, Soft Freezes, traditional set and blow drys. Can be used on wet and dry hair designs. Super Glossy, Natural Shine, never hard, easy comb out, quick drying, long lasting style, non-flaking. Leaves all textures of hair bouncy and feeling fabulous and divalicious.

categories.name: Frizzy, Needing Curl Definition & Soft Hold

name: Diva By Cindy Leave-In Detangler - 8oz
description: Eliminates dryness, brittleness, and limpness; and is especially good on over processed, dull hair. Penetrates the hair shaft quickly while detangling and adding sheen making it excellent for fine, limp hair and ideal for wraps and roller sets.

name: Diva By Cindy Stimulating Set
description: The Diva by Cindy Stimulating Set is comprised of a peppermint, camphor and menthol shampoo and conditioner, alcohol free with extreme moisturizing features, it is followed by a Leave in Detangler infused with panthenol( a B vitamin) which stops shedding and breakage. The  Diva by Cindy Super Gro hair dress included with this package is a truly therapeutic scalp formulation designed to stimulate hair growth and soothe a dry, itchy, flaky scalp.

categories.name: Thinning Hair, Stunted Hair Growth, Dry, Itchy, Flaky Scalp

name: Diva By Cindy Supergro - 4oz
description:
Apply to scalp and temples for thinning hair to promote optimal hair growth. It tingles promoting circulation and healthy hair. Contains Shea Butter, Horse Tail, Menthol and Chamomile. Dry, Itchy, Flaky scalp is a thing of the past... IT WORKS!!!!

Super Gro Hair Dress promotes hair growth and keeps proper moisture balance while detangling even the hardest to manage hair. You'll feel it tingling as it works to make sure a dry, flaky scalp is only a distant memory and that luscious locks are a thing of the future!

Shecky's Best Hair Cream Award Winner 2011.
